name: Get That Bread! (WaveParadigm)
description:
A board game RPG about a park goose in search of some delicious bread.

KNOWN ISSUES:

  • All dice have a maximum roll one less than they should have (d4s can do 1-3, d6s 1-5, etc)
  • The southern direction from the starting space has a broken space connection going from north to south.
  • EXP gain is extremely high.
  • Elemental damage calculations are incorrect (Cards are not the element they display on the tin. This is what happens when you implement an elemental system with 10 minutes to go)

These issues have been fixed but the public build will not be updated until the GMTK Game Jam voting period has ended. Please reach out if you'd like to try a fixed build.

CREDITS:
Programming: Adam Gincel, Alex Massenzio, Jake Lovrin
Art & Visual Design: Erin Duggins
Game Balance: Jake Lovrin
SFX Design: Pilot & Alex Massenzio
Music: Adam Gincel

STARRING:
Jake Lovrin as Distressed Park-Goer
Erin Duggins as Pigeon Packin' Heat

 

SFX Sources: freesound.org CC0
